text: The average holder can lift 1.3× more optimism than a normal human.
Every time someone says ‘wen’, a villain grows 0.0001% stronger.
Chat activity spikes 12% when MegaGrok sneezes somewhere in the multiverse.
The ‘First Message of the Day’ badge grants temporary confidence.
Sending a thank-you emoji increases regional kindness output.
Myth says two users who post the same meme are spiritually linked.
Helping a newcomer increases global warmth by 0.4%.
Lurkers are believed to be writing fanfiction about the dev team.
Collective laughter is the only renewable resource in GrokCity.
Voting in polls generates karma in unknown locations.
The Night Owl badge glows faintly if used with pride.
Helping newbies improves the Market of Slightly Broken Things.
Chat streaks summon tiny, invisible fireworks.
Hosting memes may grant protection from the Meme Siren.
If three users type ‘GROK’ within one minute, a legend is born.
